Featured-image: C1982-scarlet-halter-evening-gown-with-bow_p.jpg

----

Description: Vintage inspired halter top evening gown with a large bow ties at the back and hangs to the lower back. A line silhouette with pleating from the bodice down into the skirt. Waist band adds charm to the dress. Whimsical and charming.
